author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Bug fix to address rotated layers in D86. The changes will affect all workflows with HGCal. Mapping from position to DetId and vice versa are revised. This affects the public methods used in HGCalGeometry (getPosition, getClosestCell) and in HGCalDDDConstants (locateCell, locateCellHex, waferFromPosition, waferPosition)

#### PR validation:

Use the runTheMatrix test workflows 

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special
title: Phase2-hgx291 Bug fix to address rotated layers in D86
